lines.content: * The main class representing the Ken application.
* Ken is a task management Chat-Bot application that allows users to
* manage their tasks through a command-line interface.
* @param filePath The file path for storing tasks.
* It displays a welcome message, initializes the parser, and
* starts processing user commands until the user says goodbye.

* It interprets user input and performs corresponding actions on the TaskList and Storage.

* The Storage class is responsible for saving and loading tasks to and from hard drive.
* The tasks are stored in a plain text file with one task per line.
* The file is created in the "data" directory with the name "ken.txt".
* Constructs a new Storage with the specified file path.
* @param filePath the path to the file where tasks will be stored
